## SpaceNews.com Analysis

### URL Patterns to Include
- `/` - Homepage
- `/*/*/` - Year/month archives (e.g., /2023/05/)
- `/category/*` - Category pages
- `/*/` - Article pages with slug patterns
- `/tag/*` - Tag archives
- `/author/*` - Author archives
- `/civil/` - Civil space news section
- `/commercial/` - Commercial space news section
- `/military/` - Military space news section
- `/launch/` - Launch coverage section
- `/satellites/` - Satellites news section
- `/science-and-tech/` - Science and technology section
- `/people/` - People news section

### URL Patterns to Exclude
- `/wp-admin/*` - WordPress admin area
- `/wp-login.php` - Login page
- `/wp-includes/*` - WordPress system files
- `/feed/` - RSS feeds
- `*/feed/` - Category or tag feeds
- `/xmlrpc.php` - XML-RPC endpoint
- `*/page/*` - Pagination pages which duplicate content

### Recommended Crawl Depth
A crawl depth of 3 is recommended for SpaceNews.com. This will allow discovery of:
- Depth 1: Homepage and main sections
- Depth 2: Category pages and archives
- Depth 3: Individual articles and content pages

### Rate Limiting Considerations
SpaceNews.com contains over 100,000 URLs when including all articles. To efficiently crawl the site:
- Limit requests to 1 per second to avoid rate limiting
- Process sitemap files in batch mode for efficiency
- Use incremental processing with checkpoints for very large sitemaps
- Implement slug-based pattern recognition for article discovery
- Consider using archive section discovery to find older content

### Slug Patterns
SpaceNews typically uses slug patterns like:
- `/spacex-launches-new-satellite/`
- `/nasa-artemis-moon-mission/`
- `/commercial-space-station-plans/`
These patterns consist of 2-4 terms separated by hyphens, directly under the root.
